title: Loom with weaving
description: loom with several pieces of wood; red thread on top portion; multicolored, geometric weaving on bottom portion; detachable batten (received inserted into weaving), back strap, shed pick, supplementary shed stick, shed stick/ back beam and extra loop of blue synthetic cord; yellow DCM box of ten spools of thread plus two loops of thread and two addition spools which do not fit in box also received-see notes for colors
creditline: Given in honor of Maya weavers
